english.segment1: Super Star Billy Brown. Whatcha' doing to this town. Don'tcha know that everybody here. Wants to be like you
english.segment2: All of your adoring fans. Sitting in the seats and stands. Listening to every word you say. And watching every move. Once I saw a sign that said. Billy Brown for President. It ain't easy being a star. It ain't easy to be who you are. It ain't easy but you're going far. Well, you say there's nothing to it. But somebody's gotta do it, boy
english.segment3: Super Star Billy Brown. Stop and listen to the crowd. Everywhere you go. Everybody's screaming out your name
english.segment4: Do they know the reason why. You point your finger to the sky
english.segment5: We all are watching and expect. That whatever you are doing next. Well, it is gonna be the greatest thing. That we have ever seen
